attributes.action: Don't spend £900k of public money painting a plane!
attributes.additional_details: Let common sense prevail. This needs to be spent on things like the NHS, medical research, helping the record numbers of homeless people that we have in 21st century Britain, helping businesses during this horrendous time in our history, any number of valid causes, NOT TARTING UP A PLANE!
attributes.background: Read that back to yourself, £900k to paint a plane! How unbelievably ridiculous does that sound? We're fighting a global pandemic! Businesses are shutting, families are STILL having to rely on foodbanks, the economy is in tatters & you think this is "Value for money?" Think again!

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

We understand that you're also concerned about public services. You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318316
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327376
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
